mapper.insert: insert into p_order(m_no, postnum, address, detailed_address, recipient_name, recipient_phone, order_price, p_no, op_no1, option_quantity1, op_no2) values(#{m_no}, #{postnum}, #{address}, #{detailed_address}, #{recipient_name}, #{recipient_phone}, #{order_price}, #{p_no}, #{op_no1}, #{option_quantity1}, #{op_no2})
